headers.subject: [tosdr:2543] Instagram shares info with third-parties

html:
• We may also share certain information such as cookie data with third-party advertising partners. This information would allow third-party ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you.

Title: Instagram shares info with third-parties

Topic: third-party

Summary: Instagram uses cookies and shares that information with third-party advertisers, which in turns allows for targeted adds. There is no mention on how to opt out of the analytics that collect the cookie data.

Score: 50 (mediocre)

--
